Package org.technoready.meliecommerce.controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
org.technoready.meliecommerce.controller.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/orders") public class OrderController extends Object
REST Controller that manages order-related operations. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting orders. Handles order processing for users with their associated products. DATE: 18 - October - 2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jorge Armando Avila Carrillo | NAOID: 3310

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      @PostMapping("/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuccessResponseDTO<OrderResponseDTO>> createOrder(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody List<OrderDetailsDTO> detailsRequest)
      Creates a new order for a specific user with the provided order details.
      Parameters:
      userId - Long - The ID of the user who is creating the order
      detailsRequest - List - List of order details containing product ID and quantity
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with SuccessResponseDTO containing the created OrderResponseDTO

    • getOrders

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuccessResponseDTO<List<OrderResponseDTO>>> getOrders(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="true") boolean activeOnly)
      Retrieves all orders or only active orders based on the activeOnly parameter.
      Parameters:
      activeOnly - boolean - Flag to retrieve only active orders (default: true)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with SuccessResponseDTO containing list of OrderResponseDTOs

    • getOrdersByUser

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuccessResponseDTO<List<OrderResponseDTO>>> getOrdersByUser(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="true") boolean activeOnly)
      Retrieves all orders belonging to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - Long - The ID of the user
      activeOnly - boolean - Flag to retrieve only active orders (default: true)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with SuccessResponseDTO containing list of OrderResponseDTOs

    • getOrderById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuccessResponseDTO<OrderResponseDTO>> getOrderById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a specific order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - Long - The ID of the order to retrieve
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with SuccessResponseDTO containing the OrderResponseDTO
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the order is not found

    • deleteOrder

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuccessResponseDTO<Void>> deleteOrder(@PathVariable Long id)
      Soft deletes (deactivates) an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - Long - The ID of the order to delete
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with SuccessResponseDTO indicating successful deactivation
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the order is not found

    • updateOrder

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SuccessResponseDTO<OrderResponseDTO>> updateOrder(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody List<OrderDetailsDTO> detailsRequest)
      Updates an existing order with new order details.
      Parameters:
      id - Long - The ID of the order to update
      detailsRequest - List - New list of order details
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with SuccessResponseDTO containing the updated OrderResponseDTO
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the order is not found
      InactiveResourceException - if the order is inactive
